import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Generate Chart"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/charts/generate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generate a chart from natural language query and data

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["query","data"],"properties":{"query":{"type":"string","description":"Natural language query describing the desired chart","example":"Show me sales trends by month"},"data":{"type":"object","description":"Data to visualize"},"chart_type":{"type":"string","enum":["bar","line","pie","scatter","heatmap"],"description":"Preferred chart type (optional)"}},"title":"ChartGenerationRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Chart generated successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"chart_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique chart identifier"},"chart_config":{"type":"object","description":"ECharts configuration object"},"insights":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"AI-generated insights about the data"}},"title":"ChartResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Authentication required or token invalid","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"},"detail":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed error information"}},"title":"Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
